verse.name: v1
c
verse.lines: Rouse, then, soldiers, rally round the banner, Ready, steady, pass the word along; Onward, forward, shout aloud Hosanna! Christ is Captain of the mighty throng.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Strong to meet the foe, Marching on we go, While our cause we know, Must prevail; Shield and banner bright, Gleaming in the light; Battling for the right We ne’er can fail.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: O! Thou God of all, Hear us when we call, Help us one and all By Thy grace; When the battle’s done, And the vict’ry’s won, May we wear the crown Before Thy face.
